TopicTitle: Kerbal Foundries is screwing up badly.

Articles.Content: Ok so I downloaded the mod from a website, I booted up my game and it crashes my game evenytime when I use it. If you are wondering how many mods I have, I own about a lot of mods like 20-30 mods, They don't crash my game but this mod does. Please help me cause I really want this mod! If I am doing anything wrong please let me know. Thanks!

Usual procedure is to post in the thread for the mod concerned. Which I see you already did, along with PMing me.

Please calm down and learn a little forum etiquette. Thank you.
